problems.title: Count Digits
problems.description:
Write a program to count the number of digits in a given number n.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
A single integer representing the count of digits.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
12345

Sample Output
5

Explanation:
12345 has 5 digits.
hintsList: Handle the case where n is 0 separately.
Use a loop to divide n by 10 until it becomes 0, counting the iterations.
